content: slip_stitch into each of the next 2 sts 8 sts drip 6 chain 5 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 2 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into the next st 5 sts drip 7 chain 7 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 4 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into each of the next 2 sts 8 sts drip 8 chain 5 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 2 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into the next st 5 sts *fasten_off link to video https //youtu be/5tuas72lrdy if you need help or have any questions feel free to message me i will respond as soon as possible and answer or clarify any questions you may have
